content: basic beanie crochet hat pattern preemie baby toddler child teen adult designed by tricia roberts http //www busymomdesigns com 1 basic beanie crochet hat pattern preemie baby toddler child teen adult designed by tricia roberts http //www busymomdesigns com materials required chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch any worsted weight yarn in color s of st stitch your choice for hat sts stitches 5mm h-8 crochet hook for sizes up to beg beginning adult single_crochet single_crochet 5 5mm i-9 crochet hook for adult hat double_crochet double_crochet yarn needle fo fasten_off the number of stitches worked in row / stitch gauge round *__* stitches between asterisks are to be 3 double_crochet sts = 1 repeated 5 double_crochet row = 4 sizes skill level preemie up to 12 head circumference easy 0-3 months 12-14 head circumference 3-6 months 14-16 head circumference 6-12 mos - 16-18 head circumference toddler 1-3 years - 18-20 head circumference child/teen - 20-22 head circumference adult - 22-24 head circumference terms notes ch1 or ch2 at beginning of rounds is included in stitch count as first stitch if pattern says to single_crochet or double_crochet in first or same st stitch in the first double_crochet st of prev row not the chain 2 space if pattern says single_crochet 3 single_crochet one time in each of next 3 sts if pattern says 2sc complete 2 single_crochet sts in one st pattern is worked in rounds join the last double_crochet of each round to the chain 2 at the beginning of that round do not turn continue working in same direction throughout to add color changes join new color at the beginning of a round continue to work as written stitch counts in brackets include chain 2 at the beginning of each row 2 instructions use 5mm h-8 crochet hook and worsted weight yarn to change yarn colors between rounds when joining end of round with a slip_stitch insert your hook into beg chain 2 and bring up a loop of the new color to complete the st continue next round with new color preemie 3-6 months for preemies with a smaller head circumference than 10 use a 4 5mm us-7 crochet hook and round 1 chain 2 6sc in 2nd chain from hook join complete as written for preemie size with a slip_stitch to second st from hook first chain st 6 round 1 chain 2 4sc in 2nd chain from hook join round 2 chain 2 double_crochet in same st 2dc in next st with a slip_stitch to second st from hook first chain st and each around including joining st join with 4 slip_stitch to top of beg chain 2 14 round 2 chain 2 double_crochet in same st 2dc in next st round 3 chain 2 double_crochet in same st *2dc* in each and each around including joining st join with following st excluding joining st join with slip_stitch slip_stitch to top of beg chain 2 10 to top of beg chain 2 28 round 3 chain 2 double_crochet
